property.name: input_documents_metadata
property.description: input containing document metadata avro records (eu.dnetlib.iis.metadataextraction.schemas.ExtractedDocumentMetadata). Document metadata is the source of affiliations.

property.name: input_document_to_project
property.description: input containing document-project relation avro records (eu.dnetlib.iis.importer.schemas.DocumentToProject). These relations (alongside with inferred document-project and project-organization relations) are used to generate document-organization pairs which are used as a hint for matching affiliations

property.name: input_inferred_document_to_project
property.description: input containing inferred document-project relation avro records (eu.dnetlib.iis.referenceextraction.project.schemas.DocumentToProject). These relations (alongside with document-project and project-organization relations) are used to generate document-organization pairs which are used as a hint for matching affiliations

property.name: input_project_to_organization
property.description: input containing project-organization avro records (eu.dnetlib.iis.importer.schemas.ProjectToOrganization). These relations (alongside with infered document-project and document-project relations) are used to generate document-organization pairs which are used as a hint for matching affiliations

property.name: document_project_confidence_threshold
property.description: confidence level threshold for loading inferred document-project relations
